sentences: Sanan konsonantti alkuperä on latinan kielen sanasta consonare.
Esimerkkejä sanoista, joissa on paljon konsonantteja ovat esimerkiksi scratch ja strength.
context: A consonant is a type of sound in language that is made by obstructing airflow with the tongue, teeth, or lips, as opposed to vowels which are made without any obstruction.
